tool_description: Check TDS rate on Cash Withdrawal u/s 194N
name: Check TDS rate
title: Check TDS rate

api_list.name: Validate OTP and get Details
api_list.description: Validate OTP and get Details, use that reqId you get as response in generate OTP api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://check-tds-rate.p.rapidapi.com/iec/guestservicesapi/validateOTP/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-tds-rate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate OTP
api_list.description: this api makes request for OTP and returns mobTxn use that mobTxn in next api which is validate OTP and get details in that API
api_list.code:
